import{Container}from"reactstrap";import{NavLink,Link}from"react-router-dom";import{useRef}from"react";import logo from'./../../assets/images/logo.png';import shopping_basket_line from'./../../assets/images/shopping-basket-line.svg';import user_fill from'./../../assets/images/user-fill.svg';import menu_line from'./../../assets/images/menu-line.svg';import'../../styles/header.scss';import{useSelector,useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{cartUiActions}from"../../store/shopping-cart/cartUiSlice";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var nav_link=[{display:'Главная',path:'/home'},{display:'Продукты',path:'/foods'},{display:'Корзина',path:'/cart'}];var Header=function Header(){// cписок элементов корзины
var dispatch=useDispatch();var toggleCart=function toggleCart(){dispatch(cartUiActions.toggle());};// счетчик покупок в корзине
var totalQuantity=useSelector(function(state){return state.cart.totalQuantity;});// отображение меню под мобильную адаптацию
var menuRef=useRef(null);var toggleMenu=function toggleMenu(){return menuRef.current.classList.toggle('show_menu');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:"header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav_wrapper d-flex align-items-center justify-content-between",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"logo",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/home",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:logo,alt:"logo"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{children:"Mama Leahs"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"navigation",ref:menuRef,onClick:toggleMenu,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"menu d-flex align-items-center gap-5",children:nav_link.map(function(item,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(NavLink,{className:function className(navClass){return navClass.isActive?'active_menu':'';},to:item.path,children:[" ",item.display]},index);})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"nav_right d-flex align-items-center gap-4 ",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"cart_icon",onClick:toggleCart,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:shopping_basket_line,alt:"shopping_basket",style:{width:"25px",height:"30px"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"cart_badge",children:totalQuantity})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"user",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/login",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:user_fill,alt:"user",style:{width:"25px",height:"30px"}}),"  "]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"mobile_menu",onClick:toggleMenu,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:menu_line,alt:"menu",style:{width:"25px",height:"30px"}})})]})]})})});};export default Header;
